title: Council Decision of 20 September 2011 appointing a member and an alternate member of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for Malta
header:
22.9.2011 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 278/2
COUNCIL DECISION
of 20 September 2011
appointing a member and an alternate member of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for Malta
(2011/0000/)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1365/75 of 26 May 1975 on the creation of a European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions (1), and in particular Article 6 thereof,
Having regard to the lists of nominees submitted by the Governments of the Member States and by the workers' and employers' organisations,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decisions of 22 November 2010 (2) and 7 March 2011 (3), the Council appointed the members and alternate members of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for the period from 1 December 2010 to 30 November 2013, with the exception of certain members and alternate members.
(2) The Government of Malta has submitted nominations for two posts to be filled,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed member and alternate member of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for the period ending on 30 November 2013:
I.   GOVERNMENT REPRESENTATIVES
Country Member Alternate
Malta Mr Noel VELLA Ms Sylvia GAUCI
The Council will appoint the members and alternate members who have not yet been nominated at a later date.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 September 2011.
For the Council
The President
M. SAWICKI
(1)  OJ L 139, 30.5.1975, p. 1.
(2)  OJ C 322, 27.11.2010, p. 8.
(3)  OJ C 83, 17.3.2011, p. 4.
